keywords: ['live performance', 'traditional middle eastern music', 'open-mouthed humming', 'vocables', 'arabic inspired', 'ethereal female vocal', 'reverb', 'ballad', 'mellow', 'percussive chime', 'acoustic guitar arpeggio']
caption: This is a live performance of what sounds like a Middle Eastern. The female singer has a calm and soothing voice which she uses to sing vocables - or open mouthed humming. There are percussive chimes, and an acoustic guitar arpeggio which adds to the calm and soothing feel of the song.
